title: Taylor Farms Recalls Chicken and Pork Salad Products Due To Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE (Feb 15, 2017): This release is being reissued after it was determined that one product was listed twice. WASHINGTON, Feb. 11, 2017 Two Taylor Farms establishments, located in Dallas, Texas and in Tracy, California, and headquartered in Salinas, California, are recalling approximately 6,630...

establishment.name: Taylor Farm - Pacific
establishment.address:
1820 N. Mac Arthur Drive 
  Tracy, CA 95376

impacted_products: 10.5 oz. plastic trays of “Signature Café Southwest Style Salad with Chicken” with the following “USE BY” dates: “2/13/17, 2/14/17, 2/15/17 or 2/16/17.”
8.25 oz. plastic trays of “H-E-B Shake Rattle & Bowl Rowdy Ranch Hand (contains pork)” with the following “USE BY” dates: “2/17/17, 2/18/17 or 2/19/17.”
